verses.name: Numbers 26:26
verses.text: Of the sons of Zebulun after their families: of Sered, the family of the Sardites: of Elon, the family of the Elonites: of Jahleel, the family of the Jahleelites.

verses.name: Numbers 26:27
verses.text: These are the families of the Zebulunites according to those that were numbered of them, threescore thousand and five hundred.

verses.name: Numbers 26:28
verses.text: The sons of Joseph after their families were Manasseh and Ephraim.

verses.name: Numbers 26:29
verses.text: Of the sons of Manasseh: of Machir, the family of the Machirites: and Machir begat Gilead: of Gilead come the family of the Gileadites.
